snippet: A federal appeals court reversed a lower court’s decision to throw out Viacom’s $1 billion copyright infringement lawsuit against YouTube.
abstract: A federal appeals court reversed a lower court’s decision to throw out Viacom’s $1 billion copyright infringement lawsuit against YouTube.

headline.main: Appeals Court Revives Viacom Suit Against YouTube
headline.print_headline: Viacom Suit Vs. YouTube Is Restored
